channel.title: Item Slots
channel.description:
Ok I recently made a command where it gives you armor, I need help on this part.
Usually it's
addItem(1, 1);
Instead of adding it to the inventory, whats the command to make the item go to a specific armor slot like for instance the slot for plate bodies?
